name: Bird! Avoid Spikes
description:
Made clone of a game Don't touch the spikes by Ketchapp as an exercise during quarantine.

To play - simply click to make the bird fly upwards in the direction it's facing. You lose if bird touches the spikes.

Used Unity as an engine. Sounds comes from Kenney and "Pop, Low, A (H1).wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org. Code available here on my GitHub. 

Thanks for checking out!
